decision_conditions: The development shall be operated in accordance with the Delivery and Serving Plan hereby approved.Reason: In order to protect the amenities of the area and accord with policy DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Conditions 23 (Delivery and Servicing Plan)of planning permission 18/16440/FUL (Demolition of the existing buildings and the construction of a mixed-use development comprising a food/convenience retail store (392 sqm) at ground floor level (Use Class A1) and four residential units comprising 2 x 2 bed and 2 x 3 bed self contained units above (Use Class C3) with associated parking, loading bay, landscaping and access)Please refer to the covering letter.
